overview:
With over 10 years of programming experience in multiple languages including assembler, cobol, C, C++, Visual Basic, Perl, Python, Java, Javascript, HTML and ruby, one would be hard pressed to find a better candidate to lead a company.

Not only has he got experience in software programming, he is also known for tinkering with electronics, building home computers and even laying down the odd wired and wireless network.

As the Director of Prododgenous Services, he single handedly, architectured, designed, wrote, build and implement the entire architecture for both the hardware and software for the storage solution at dookal.com.

He has worked on a couple high visibility projects in South Africa, but has since moved to the beautiful city of Sydney, Australia, where he is now the Director of Prododgenous Services Pty. Ltd.

He has a passion for learning new technologies and try to implement them wherever he can. Of course, it has to be stable ;-) He’s favourite sites include Slashdot.org and engadget, where he get’s his fix of technobabble everyday.
